1. Trump says venture capitalist David Sacks will be AI and crypto 'czar'  CNBC
  2. What Trump’s New AI and Crypto Czar David Sacks Means For the Tech Industry  TIME
  3. Who is David Sacks, Trump's crypto and AI czar?  CBS News
  4. Donald Trump Names David Sacks as White House AI and Crypto Czar  Bloomberg
  5. What David Sacks as AI czar (with Elon Musk as wingman) could mean for OpenAI  Fortune
